About

Responsive

With around 80% of Americans now carrying pocket-sized computers everywhere they go; the majority of website visitors will actually never see your desktop version; this is important because, as web developers, everything we make & produce should be mobile friendly.

Intuitive

With a strong preference for easy to use UX/UI; I believe, as developers, we should always be designing & developing for the end-user. This means making things easier & less complicated for the user; not harder. Otherwise, what's the point?

Dynamic

We've passed Web 1.0 & onward into Web 2.0. So, why make a website static and "boring". Making dynamic websites is essential in the professional world we live in today. I love making pages come to life while keeping the concept of simplicity in mind.
